schema.description:
版本类型。支持：

- **FOTA**：系统升级
- **APP**：应用升级

IdType.description:
设备ID类型，支持：

- **device_id**：硬件ID
- **sn**：序列号
- **vin**：车架号
- **hardware_id**：硬件ID

TotalCount.description: 总共符合条件的设备数

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "DeviceList": {
    "TotalCount": 30,
    "Items": [
      {
        "GmtCreateTimestamp": 1868400000,
        "OriginalId": "23452345234523452",
        "DeviceId": "AS23DG23SA5D43GA34SD23GW456E",
        "IdType": "hardware_id",
        "GmtCreate": "2018-02-14 14:20:18",
        "Id": 123
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "HostId": "iovcc.cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com",
  "Code": "NoPermissionToAccessProject",
  "Message": "User is not authorized to access the specified project."
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<FindVersionWhiteDevicesResponse>
	<RequestId>6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064</RequestId>
	<DeviceList>
		<TotalCount>25</TotalCount>
		<Items>
			<Id>1</Id>
			<DeviceId>AS23DG23SA5D43GA34SD23GW456E</DeviceId>
			<IdType>hardware_id</IdType>
			<OriginalId>23452345234523452</OriginalId>
			<GmtCreate>2018-02-14 14:20:18</GmtCreate>
		</Items>
	</DeviceList>
</FindVersionWhiteDevicesResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 分页获取系统版本或应用版本的设备白名单
summary: 调用FindVersionWhiteDevices分页获取系统版本或应用版本的设备白名单。
